insurance.title: The insurance will cover

coverage.text: Up to 12 repayments in case of loss of employment or business, incapacity for work, or caring for family member.
The outstanding balance in the event of ZTP/P status recognition, second- or third-degree disability, or death.

doctor.text: With insurance, you have access to a 24/7 Virtual Clinic with a doctor available, who can provide services such as e-prescriptions or referrals for examinations.

insurance.termsAndConditions: By continuing you confirm that you are not disabled and that you have read and understood the Insurance Terms and Conditions. In case of disability, no payout will be made for the insurance claim.

interestInfoSheet.title: How can I get the best interest rate?
interestInfoSheet.detail:
You can get the best interest rate by borrowing up to 80% of the estimated property value. 

We generally offer loans up to 80% of the estimated property value. However, clients under 36 years old may qualify for a higher loan amount, up to a maximum of 90% of the estimated value.

exampleInfo.detail: Loan amount 2 500 000 CZK, repayment period 30 years, number of repayments 360, fixed-rate period 5 years.

content.title: What is charged:
content.text:
・Collateral suitability assessment fee: CZK 3,000
・Fee for submitting a lien registration request: CZK 2,000 per request
・Fee for submitting a lien removal request: CZK 1,600 per request
・Fee for signature verification on the Mortgage Collateral Agreement: CZK 50

content.title: Further conditions:
content.text:
・The loan must be secured by a mortgage on the property, and the collateral value must not be disproportionately low compared to the secured claim.  
・Property insurance (for the collateral) is required for the entire duration of the loan agreement. The cost of this insurance is not included in the APR, as its exact amount is unknown at the time of calculation.

footers:
The advertised interest rate is subject to maintaining a monthly credit income of CZK 15,000 in the account designated for mortgage repayments.  
The APR and the total amount payable by the borrower are calculated based on the assumption of a single borrower, a single guarantor, and a single collateral property. The calculation also assumes a loan amount of up to 80% of the property's value.  
If the loan is repaid in a currency different from the one in which it was issued, the loan amount and monthly repayments may fluctuate due to changes in the foreign currency's value relative to CZK.
Disclaimer: The displayed calculations and figures are for illustrative purposes only. Loan approval is not guaranteed, and the offer is non-binding.
